description:
The 7th Division is a platoon that is led by First Lieutenant http://anidb.net/ch94285 [Tsurumi] and is one of the opposing forces in the series. They are also known as the Hokuchin Unit, the Defenders of Northern Japan and the Strongest Unit. Most of the soldiers of the 7th Division that have appeared in the series belong to the 27th Infantry Regiment. Their headquarter is based in Asahikawa.
Source: Golden Kamuy Wiki
name: Dainanashidan
